name: linguistika
description: Gestor de horarios y tutor√≠as para centro de idiomas

scripts.dev:both: powershell -Command "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList 'cd \"$((Get-Location))\" ; npm run dev:backend' ; npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.desktop:dev: concurrently -k -n VITE,ELECTRON -c cyan,magenta "cd LInguistika-Studio && npm run dev -- --port 5173 --strictPort" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npx electron ."
scripts.desktop:prod: npm run build:frontend && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$env:FORCE_PROD='1'; npx electron ."
scripts.desktop:prod:debug: npm run build:frontend && powershell -NoProfile -Command "$env:FORCE_PROD='1'; $env:ELECTRON_DEBUG='1'; npx electron ."
